canonical_datasets.description: A text-based dataset comprising duplicate references to scientific publications; structured CSV version used.
Product dataset; structured dataset; from DeepMatcher, ER Benchmark, and Magellan data repository
An e-commerce product dataset collected from multiple websites.
Widely recognized for Dirty ER benchmarks.
Citation domain dataset containing bibliographic duplicates sourced from DBLP and Google Scholar.
Citation domain dataset containing bibliographic duplicates sourced from Citeseer and DBLP.
Music domain dataset including information from various platforms.
Music 20K dataset, used for Dirty ER benchmarks; large-scale variants up to 50K records.
Product dataset; structured dataset; from DeepMatcher, ER Benchmark, and Magellan data repository

canonical_metrics.formulation: \mathrm{ACC}=\frac{\text { CorrectCount }}{|\Re|} \quad \text { CorrectCount }=\sum_{X_{j} \in \mathbb{X}} \sum_{x \in X_{j}} \mathbb{I}(\exists y \in M_{j}^{\prime}, y=x)
canonical_metrics.description: Proportion of correctly clustered records according to the ground truth clusters.
Harmonic mean of purity and inverse-purity, evaluating clustering homogeneity and stability.

canonical_baselines.description: LLM-based ER method employing traditional blocking and iterative partition scoring.
Batch-Questioning: Batches pairwise match questions into a single prompt for LLMs.
Clustering-based design that filters irrelevant pairs and uses LLM to cluster ambiguous cases.
